data.system_settings: Android Version 8.1.0 Samsung Experience-Version 9.5 Baseband-Version J530FXXU3BRJ1
data.actual_result: The picture streched / bugges out. It returns to normal when you create the server fully
data.expected_result: The picture would show as normal. Or atleast a cropped version.
data.short_description: Server picture bugging out when using 16:9 format
data.steps_to_repro: - Click the Create Server button - Input a picture to use as the server logo - Use the 16:9 format - Click the checkmark to accept the picture
